location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Moore and George Skipp, East India Company Agents at Bussora [Basra], to James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the loss of The Defianceand the wills of William Bowyear and Dymoke Lyster, both of whom died in the accident. The appointment of John Yoakly Botham as temporary assistant at Bushire is announced. Pleasure is expressed at the news of the withdrawal of Persian troops from around Bushire.
